sense.gloss: protection, defence, support, safeguarding, championship, vindication
shugo (Kamakura or Muromachi period military governor)
defense of one's country, defence of one's country
to protect, to guard, to defend
to keep (i.e. a promise), to abide (by the rules), to observe, to obey, to follow
garbage can, rubbish bin, trash can, dustbin

r_ele.r: かんきょうほごろんしゃ
かんごふようせいじょ

sense.gloss: escort vessel, destroyer (Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force)
